observation.output:
=== Test 1: Basic level restoration ===
Initial handler level: 0
After set_level(42): 42
After _finalize(): 0
✅ Basic restoration works

=== Test 2: Multiple set_level calls ===
Initial handler level: 0
After first set_level(10): 10
After second set_level(20): 20
After third set_level(30): 30
After _finalize(): 0
✅ Multiple set_level calls work correctly

=== Test 3: No set_level called ===
Initial handler level: 0
After _finalize() without set_level: 0
✅ _finalize() works when set_level was never called

=== Test 4: Different initial levels ===
Testing with initial level 0
  ✅ Restored correctly to 0
Testing with initial level 10
  ✅ Restored correctly to 10
Testing with initial level 20
  ✅ Restored correctly to 20
Testing with initial level 30
  ✅ Restored correctly to 30

=== Test 5: Both logger and handler restoration ===
Initial logger level: 30
Initial handler level: 0
After set_level(42) - logger: 42, handler: 42
After _finalize() - logger: 30, handler: 0
✅ Both logger and handler levels restored correctly

🎉 All tests passed! The fix works correctly.
